import React from 'react' import Header from './Header' import Footer from './Footer' import Main from './Main' import PopupWithForm from './PopupWithForm' import ImagePopup from './ImagePopup' function App() { const [isEditProfilePopupOpen, setEditProfilePopupOpen] = React.useState(false) const [isAddPlacePopupOpen, setAddPlacePopupOpen] = React.useState(false) const [isEditAvatarPopupOpen, setEditAvatarPopupOpen] = React.useState(false) const [selectedCard, setSelectedCard] = React.useState(null) function handleEditAvatarClick() { setEditAvatarPopupOpen(true) } function handleEditProfileClick() { setEditProfilePopupOpen(true) } function handleAddPlaceClick() { setAddPlacePopupOpen(true) } function handleCardClick(card) { setSelectedCard(card) } function closeAllPopups() { setEditAvatarPopupOpen(false) setEditProfilePopupOpen(false) setAddPlacePopupOpen(false) setSelectedCard(null) } return (
{/*

); } export default App;
